books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: Detective Alex Cross’s family is kidnapped by a madman who wants to turn Cross into a perfect killer.
books.name: HOPE TO DIE

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: John Puller, a special agent with the Army, hunts for his brother, who was convicted of treason and has escaped from prison.
books.name: THE ESCAPE

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A lawyer joins a legal clinic in a small Virginia town, and becomes involved in litigation against the coal mining industry.
books.name: GRAY MOUNTAIN

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: The Los Angeles detective Harry Bosch and his new partner investigate two long-unsolved cases.
books.name: THE BURNING ROOM

books.author: by Sylvia Day
books.description: Eva and Gideon's love is threatened by old wounds; a Crossfire novel.
books.name: CAPTIVATED BY YOU

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: The continuing relationship over five decades between a disgraced clergyman and a drug-addicted musician whom he mentored as a boy.
books.name: REVIVAL

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: Who will end up dead, and how, when three mothers with children in the same school become friends?
books.name: BIG LITTLE LIES

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Gena Showalter
books.description: The immortal warrior Torin, whose touch causes sickness and death, is tempted by a powerful beauty who has escaped a centuries-long imprisonment; a Lords of the Underworld novel.
books.name: THE DARKEST TOUCH

books.author: by Lisa Scottoline
books.description: Judy Carrier, a lawyer at Rosato & Associates, investigates the death of her aunt’s housekeeper while dealing with her own emotional upheavals.
books.name: BETRAYED

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman who was spared when her mother and sisters were murdered begins to reinvestigate the case against her imprisoned brother.
books.name: DARK PLACES

books.author: by Jodi Picoult
books.description: After searching for her mother, who has disappeared, for more than 10 years, a woman employs a psychic and a private detective.
books.name: LEAVING TIME

books.author: by Patricia Cornwell
books.description: Dr. Kay Scarpetta pursues a sniper who may be a vigilante; the 22nd Scarpetta novel.
books.name: FLESH AND BLOOD

books.author: by Sarah MacLean
books.description: By day, she's Lady Georgiana, ruined sister to a duke. But in London's darkest corners, she's Chase, the owner of a legendary casino.
books.name: NEVER JUDGE A LADY BY HER COVER
